name: Shopify's Dawn Theme - Online Store 2.0
description:
If you're designing themes for the new Shopify online store 2.0 and you wished you had the Dawn theme as a nicely put together Figma file.


Ta da, wish granted.


Change log


Sunday December 12, 2021

Over the last month or so I got some much needed help from two designers Ariel Wu and Drew Herrema. Thank you both for your contribution to this community project. Here's what we did:

  • Added the Rich text component with all its variants
  • Added the Footer component with all its variants. There are extra configurations you can add with the footer if you dig into the component, things like image, text, menu1 and menu2 can be applied to each content block within the footer.
  • Added the page component
  • Added the blog post component


Wednesday October 20, 2021

  • Started the incorporation of the Shopify's Theme Editor Components, another community file I made (get it here), to show how each section can be customized in the settings panel.
  • Added the settings for the Header image section and will progressively add all the section and block settings for all sections over the coming weeks.


Tuesday September 21, 2021

  • Added all the placeholder svgs found when installing a theme for the first time.


Tuesday September 14, 2021

  • Imported all the SVG icons from the source Dawn theme
  • Set all icons in a bounding box of 20x20


Monday September 13, 2021

  • Update the color system to more closely match that of the Dawn theme colors using Accent 1 Background 1 etc.
  • Text color is now distinct from background and accent colors making for easier customization
  • Added a new cover thumbnail to describe all the stuff you get


Friday September 10, 2021

  • Added the complete mobile version for Dawn
  • Added the Featured Collection section for Desktop and Mobile,
  • Added the Collage section for Desktop and Mobile
  • Added the Image with text section for mobile
  • Splitting up Components from Snippets to manage assets better
  • Added prototype pages for each mobile page, the homepage demonstrates the navigation, the collection page demonstrates filtering, the search page demonstrates search
